Education

B.A., Integrative Biology, emphasis in evolutionary biology (GPA 3.6)

Work Experience

Berkeley Builds Capacity, [uhs.berkeley.edu/bbc]
Project Coordinator [30hr/wk] December 2011 – October 2015
  • Collaborate with community organizations to develop HIV testing events.
  • Train and mentor outreach workers and HIV test counselors.
  • Develop, maintain and update testing and referral protocols.
  • Provide client-centered HIV counseling to at-risk populations in the East Bay.

Academic Services Center, UC Berkeley, [academicservices.berkeley.edu]
Chemistry Tutor [15 hrs/wk] August 2010 – May 2011
  • Prepared and taught weekly general and organic chemistry workshops to undergraduate students.

Plants Systematics Division, Universität Kassel, [uni-kassel.de/fb19/botany]
Research Assistant [40 hrs/wk] May 2010 – August 2010
  • Scholarship awarded to perform research in Kassel, Germany.
  • Gathered genetic information using DNA extraction, PCR, gel electrophoresis and DNA sequencing.
  • Analyzed data to determine the phylogeny (relatedness) of Pitcairnia, a Bromeliaceae (plant) genus by comparing rpl32 sequences (ribosomal DNA)

Volunteer Experience

Berkeley Free Clinic, [berkeleyfreeclinic.org]
Section Coordinator, Men's Health Collective [20hrs/wk] April 2012 - present
  • Update, review and flag client charts to improve continuity and quality of care.
  • Communicate with public health departments to ensure client partner follow-ups.
  • Tabulate morbidity and demographic statistics.
  • Train new volunteers and medics.
  • Provide assessment and treatment of sexually transmitted infections.
  • Developed occupational exposure team to respond to needle sticks
  • Wrote grants to fund services provided.

Certified Enrollment Counselor [10 hrs/wk] November 2013 – present
  • Assist uninsured clients in enrolling in Medi-Cal and Covered California-subsidized plans.
  • Develop of enrollment program within clinic with 10 other volunteers including generation and documentation of base of knowledge around the state of health coverage in Alameda County.

UC Berkeley - Department of Integrative Biology
Undergraduate Research Assistant, [research.berkeley.edu/urap] September 2009 - May 2011
  • Developed and maintained database of bacterial flagella
  • Investigated homologies (similarities) in bacterial flagella
